org.apache.cayenne.remote.hessian.service

Class HessianServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • com.caucho.hessian.server.HessianServlet
        • org.apache.cayenne.configuration.rop.server.ROPHessianServlet
          • org.apache.cayenne.remote.hessian.service.HessianServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    Deprecated. 
    since 3.1 use ROPHessianServlet.

    @Deprecated
public class HessianServlet
extends ROPHessianServlet
    Deprecated since 3.1 in favor of ROPHessianServlet. Note that if you keep using this servlet in your web.xml, only default configuration will work, as "api-class" and "service-class" parameters are no longer supported. ROPHessianServlet supports "extra-modules" parameter instead to customize ROP service via HessianServletConfigurator.
    Since:
    1.2
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
